about_the_game:
The new battleship officially launched -Flames-type Aircraft Carrier,codename：Flame Queen！

Content
1.Unlocks a warship, “Flames-type Aircraft Carrier”.
2.Unlocks a tactical device, “Shadow IV”.
3.Unlocks a tactical device, “Lightning IV”.

Flames-type Aircraft Carrier developed by the Imperial Army,it has a higher than the traditional aircraft carrier speed and speed.Because it is like the flame of the general painting, it is known as the Empire Fleet Queen of flames,it has a strong pursuit and interception capabilities, in the shortest possible time the enemy destroyed!

We will also give away the "Shadow IV" and "Lightning Ⅳ type" two purple quality of the UAV, hoping to bring players more tactical combinations.
detailed_description:
The new battleship officially launched -Flames-type Aircraft Carrier,codename：Flame Queen！

Content
1.Unlocks a warship, “Flames-type Aircraft Carrier”.
2.Unlocks a tactical device, “Shadow IV”.
3.Unlocks a tactical device, “Lightning IV”.

Flames-type Aircraft Carrier developed by the Imperial Army,it has a higher than the traditional aircraft carrier speed and speed.Because it is like the flame of the general painting, it is known as the Empire Fleet Queen of flames,it has a strong pursuit and interception capabilities, in the shortest possible time the enemy destroyed!

We will also give away the "Shadow IV" and "Lightning Ⅳ type" two purple quality of the UAV, hoping to bring players more tactical combinations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2.4 GHz, AMD Athlon™ X2 2.8 GHz, or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0, 512MB VRam
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Make sure you have the latest drivers installed for your graphics card.

short_description: A pain DLC for “Galaxy Reavers” that unlocks the warship “Flames-type Aircraft Carrier” as well as the “Shadow IV” and “Lightning IV” tactical devices, which will bring commanders more tactical choices in game.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, French*, German*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
